dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The National Bank of Kazakhstan just announced these commemorative coins for the 80th anniversary of Victory Day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The National Bank of Kazakhstan just announced these commemorative coins for the eightieth anniversary of Victory Day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of Kazakhstan is issuing commemorative coins titled Uly Zhenis. 80 zhyl (Great Victory. 80 Years) as part of the Outstanding Events and People series. The release of these collector coins, with face values of 200 and 1,000 tenge, is dedicated to the 80th anniversary of Victory Day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the Uly Zhenis. 80 zhyl ones, right? I saw they're part of that Outstanding Events and People series.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the Uly Zhenis. eighty zhyl ones, right? I saw they're part of that Outstanding Events and People series.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of Kazakhstan is issuing commemorative coins titled Uly Zhenis. 80 zhyl (Great Victory. 80 Years) as part of the Outstanding Events and People series.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're doing two versions—one at 200 tenge, another at 1,000 tenge. The design's really symbolic too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're doing two versions-one at two hundred tenge, another at ten hundred tenge. The design's really symbolic too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The release of these collector coins, with face values of 200 and 1,000 tenge, is dedicated to the 80th anniversary of Victory Day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mm, the eternal flame on there is such a powerful symbol for remembering fallen heroes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mm, the eternal flame on there is such a powerful symbol for remembering fallen heroes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The coins feature an eternal flame, symbolizing the memory of fallen heroes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the number 80 has this ornamental design that's like the Victory ribbon, but with nods to the Kazakh flag.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the number eighty has this ornamental design that's like the Victory ribbon, but with nods to the Kazakh flag.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ornamental design on the number 80 represents the Victory ribbon and is stylized to echo elements of the Kazakh national flag.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a nice touch, blending national pride with historical remembrance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a nice touch, blending national pride with historical remembrance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The higher-value coin, um, the 1,000 tenge one—it's made of sterling silver with gold plating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The higher-value coin, um, the ten hundred tenge one-it's made of sterling silver with gold plating.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 1,000 tenge coins are made of 925 sterling silver with gold plating, with a limited mintage of 2,000 pieces.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Fancy! And only 2,000 of those are being minted, so they're definitely collector's items.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fancy! And only two thousand of those are being minted, so they're definitely collector's items.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 1,000 tenge coins are made of 925 sterling silver with gold plating, with a limited mintage of 2,000 pieces.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The 200 tenge ones are way more accessible—10 million pieces, meant for everyday use alongside regular coins.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The two hundred tenge ones are way more accessibleminus ten million pieces, meant for everyday use alongside regular coins.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 200 tenge coins are made of a nickel-brass and cupronickel alloy, with a circulation of 10 million pieces. These are intended for general use alongside standard circulation coins in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So people can actually spend them? That's cool—makes the anniversary feel present in daily life.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So people can actually spend them? That's cool-makes the anniversary feel present in daily life.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a neat way to keep history alive, literally in your pocket.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a neat way to keep history alive, literally in your pocket.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder if collectors outside Kazakhstan will be trying to get their hands on these, especially the silver ones.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh for sure. Limited mintage, meaningful theme—it's gonna be popular.
